file_content.text: Soon, Jedi, we'll make the Flesh Raiders hurt.
If you won't help me obtain the elixir, then we have nothing to discuss.
It's your fault we don't have the strength to fight the Flesh Raiders. You denied us the elixir!
Ah, Jedi. You've been to the Flesh Raider caves. I can smell them on you.
You have my elixir? I'm eager to feed my guardsmen.
I hope you'll use it to protect your village.
Do good with it.
Protecting Kalikori was always my goal. Take your credits and know that you've earned your reward.
Here.
You've done well by the Pilgrims. Take your credits and be proud.
Do you have payment?
Here are your credits. You've done well by the Pilgrims.
I'll tell Vederiat the elixir was destroyed. But before long, my warriors will strike at the Flesh Raider settlement.
May the Force be with you as you fight.
Best wishes.
Will Vederiat and the Matriarch object?
What about your superiors?
Perhaps, but the elixir is mine now. My warriors will obey me.
You're in over your head.
If so, I will die with my men, surrounded by Flesh Raider corpses.
Be on your way, Jedi. And the next time you cut into a Flesh Raider, think of us.
I will wait for you to bring me the Flesh Raider elixir, Jedi.
Jedi. I think I know what you've been doing. Vederiat sent you to speak with me.
She told you about the Flesh Raider elixir, didn't she? How it makes the Flesh Raiders strong?
She said you'd tell me how to find the elixir.
I came for help.
Yes, yes. All I ask is that you listen to what I have to say, first.
You know?
Nothing like that.
No? Well, I have things to say, too. Things you'll want to hear.
Vederiat's been looking for a way to destroy the elixir--but she's making a terrible mistake.
We shouldn't destroy the elixir. We need it! And I'll pay you well if you bring it to me.
Why?
I'm not here to bargain with you. Just tell me where the elixir is.
I just want information.
But I can pay you credits--Republic credits. More than Vederiat will offer.
You'll pay me?
Credits! Republic credits--more than Vederiat will offer.
The elixir can make our guardsmen strong. Yes, it may change them, but it will work. We can defend our village and destroy our foes.
You can't be serious. It drives Flesh Raiders mad.
The elixir's too dangerous.
This is the way to victory!
It'll corrupt you.
We won't defeat our enemies by doing nothing!
Makes sense.
Then you understand.
Imagine--if the elixir can make a Flesh Raider powerful, what would it do for a Pilgrim warrior?
Bring it to me, and you will be rewarded. Praised!
I won't help you feed the elixir to the Pilgrims.
The elixir must be destroyed.
Fine. Obey the orders of an old woman and destroy the elixir... but Pilgrim blood is on your hands.
The elixir is in the caves beyond our village. I doubt Jedi can even come close to the vats.
All right. You'll get your elixir.
Elixir for credits. Deal.
Ha! Good. I'll speak to Vederiat and tell her you report to me now.
The elixir is in the Flesh Raider caves beyond Kalikori. I'll have your credits waiting when you return.
You may pass.
